specialTipSize.specialTip: Each day, the first employee to get a good work result will earn the "love of the clam girl".
Employees with the "love of the clam girl" had increased ability stats.
There is a moderate chance that the Qliphoth Counter will reduce if the work result is normal or bad.

After an employee with the "love of the clam girl" has worked on $0 several times, $0 will devour that employee and immediately breach containment. After devouring the employee, $0 was far more aggressive than usual.
